tasks.label: C++: Build and Run
args: if (!(Test-Path '.temp')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name '.temp' | Out-Null }; g++ -fdiagnostics-color=always -g '${file}' -o '.temp\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host '=== Program Output ===' -ForegroundColor Green; & '.temp\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe'; Write-Host '=== Program Finished ===' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'Compilation Failed!' -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Build and run current C++ file (hide exe files)

tasks.label: Java: Compile and Run
args: $binDir = '${workspaceFolder}\bin'; if (!(Test-Path $binDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $binDir | Out-Null }; $classFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path '${fileDirname}' -Filter '*.class' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($classFiles) { Remove-Item $classFiles -Force }; javac -d $binDir '${file}'; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host '=== Program Output ===' -ForegroundColor Green; java -cp $binDir ${fileBasenameNoExtension}; Write-Host '=== Program Finished ===' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'Compilation Failed!' -ForegroundColor Red }
tasks.detail: Compile and run current Java file (.class files go to bin directory)

tasks.label: Java: Clean all .class files
args: $classFiles = Get-ChildItem -Path '${workspaceFolder}' -Filter '*.class' -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($classFiles) { $classFiles | Remove-Item -Force; Write-Host ('✓ Deleted ' + $classFiles.Count + ' .class files') -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '✓ No .class files found' -ForegroundColor Green }
tasks.detail: Remove all .class files from the workspace
